div.p:
Sean: Hello.
I’m a PC,
and I’ve been made into a stereotype.
Uche: I’m a PC, and I’m not what you call hip.
Bill Gates: I’m a PC, and I wear glasses.
Feng (Susan): I wear glasses.
Female Student in South Africa: Hey, I wear glasses.
Young Guy: I wear jeans.
Geneticist: And I study genes.
Jennifer Lee: And I design jeans.
Edouard Francois: And I design green buildings.
French Student: I’m a PC and I study the law.
Lawyer: And I practice the law.
Alex Poli: And I challenge the law.
Obama Blogger: I’m a PC and I blog for Obama.
Benjamin Ferguson: And I broadcast for McCain.
Bearded Man: And I have a beard.
Tony Parker: I’m a PC and I have three rings.
Eva Longoria: I am a PC and I have one ring.
Dave Van Ommering: I turn number two into energy.
Geoff Green: I’m a PC, and I want to protect these.
Teacher: I’m a PC and I’m connected to more than a billion others worldwide.
Bernard Harris: Roger that Houston, I’m a PC.
Roger: And my name is Roger. I’m a PC.
Jasmin Santanen: I’m a PC.
Student: I’m PC.
Pharrel: Yea, I’m a PC, too.
Deepak Chopra: I’m a PC and a human being.
Not a human doing, not a human thinking, ....
... a human being.
Fisherman: I’m a PC and I sell fish.
